body: If there exists `tf.cond` (which is switch for train/validation at the same code), it cannot be correctly converted. So I change `tf.cond` to python if-else (like `tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm`'s `smart_cond`) for my own batchnorm layers and it works. It is difficult to deal with batchnorm.
